oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "The Recent Interstate Competitive Drill and Encampment at Memphis, Tennessee"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: military; U.S. Army; Chickasaw Guards; portraits; 1890s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Six photographs: Miss Louise Austin, sponser for Company H, United States Infantry; the Neely Zouaves of Memphis; Dress parade, showing General Snowden and Staff; Miss Imogene Snowden, sponsor for the National Fencibles; Troop D, Cavalry, Regular Army; the Famous Chickasaw Guards of Memphis and sponsors.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Somers
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Illustrations from Harper's Weekly Newspaper and Frank Leslie's Illustrated Newspaper
